Rushing to launch, the startup reused primes across users' RSA keys. Can you recover the secret message? Ciphertext: ciphertext1: 5902249793810723769031219310389978782522936168169309487119608299932293373971404423866573019018714075002346965998887945239257200842921506150516338237544433, ciphertext2: 1045199804448578174075259610691775370286041667622251928062447749899896290280343367739441860320303418798147632602842582139053142913617479394079747902266719

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=6946662703789226107295385814341594906359287547595155543358219786997422978882119278622860813082271864311856979220207247035912313126516275646627966174816647, n2=10980103544338889235865709434016472539329717790615854398792358460734688172807001245798095089604514466760114930233708313675939909387011050606457961364321461, e=2638819581022429003160883132464061181850500952597091638453207585442305513669448835748836762060591331299789020302561844175312107522377334874812001551561515

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{xvudxd7j}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 5902249793810723769031219310389978782522936168169309487119608299932293373971404423866573019018714075002346965998887945239257200842921506150516338237544433, ciphertext2: 1045199804448578174075259610691775370286041667622251928062447749899896290280343367739441860320303418798147632602842582139053142913617479394079747902266719
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=6946662703789226107295385814341594906359287547595155543358219786997422978882119278622860813082271864311856979220207247035912313126516275646627966174816647, n2=10980103544338889235865709434016472539329717790615854398792358460734688172807001245798095089604514466760114930233708313675939909387011050606457961364321461, e=2638819581022429003160883132464061181850500952597091638453207585442305513669448835748836762060591331299789020302561844175312107522377334874812001551561515
extra_info: p=61718455173236523267592026514260385009160671011635024312105405691203610566773, q=112554059953230392454665966804861649939876853263955675926908046606990077862539, r=97554042465473511274819904830055322132182579760937988715952993259329260055999, φ(n1)=6946662703789226107295385814341594906359287547595155543358219786997422978881945006107734346166549606318537857185258209511636722426277262194329772486387336, φ(n2)=10980103544338889235865709434016472539329717790615854398792358460734688172806791137695676385700784980888480013261636254242915015722368189566591642026402924
